trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time the power drops below the specified value in watts.
This Trigger fires every time the solar power rises above the specified value in watts.
This trigger fires when the solar power drops below the specified value in watts.
This Trigger fires when the selected appliance is turned off.
This Trigger fires when the selected appliance is turned on.
This Trigger fires every time the power rises above the specified value in watts.
